description: Aquarius DÃ©gel is the Aquarius Gold Saint in Lost Canvas. He is known in Sanctuary as the "wisest among Athena`s Saints". He is the only person, besides the Great Pope, who can read and interpret the stars. Apart from this he appears to be very calm and polite. He has his own library and is the only Saint who wears glasses.
name: Aquarius no Degel
